name: Castle Beat (Raindrop Interactive, DuarteCarneiro, Vasco Borges, Ivo Penedo)
name_original: Castle Beat (Raindrop Interactive, DuarteCarneiro, Vasco Borges, Ivo Penedo)
description:
Top-Down Rhythm game where you protect your Castle by using the traps at your disposal. (Playstation 4 controller required)

Global Game Jam 2019
